items: Developing and writing a technical plan
Purchasing and preparing building materials and tools
Designing decorations, art objects, and installations
Loading and transporting all necessary items

festival.title: At the festival:
items: Decorating the area, installing decor and installations
Technical maintenance of objects and infrastructure

preparation.title: Festival preparation:
items: Creating and managing social networks, groups, and events
Translating content into Romanian and English
Interacting with press, media, and bloggers

festival.title: At the festival:
items: Supporting the info center in spreading news

preparation.title: Festival preparation:
items: Searching and selecting artists, hosts, speakers, and masters
Collecting and forming the cultural program (concerts, performances, workshops, etc.)
Communication and coordination with program participants
Assisting with logistics, technical, and domestic issues for artists

festival.title: At the festival:
items: Welcoming artists, accompanying and accommodating them
Coordinating the cultural program on-site (timing, stages, venues)
Maintaining the atmosphere and spirit of the creative space

preparation.title: Festival preparation:
items: Recruiting a team of cooks, firekeepers, kitchen assistants, and dishwashers
Preparing a list of product and inventory purchases
Organizing the catering system (locations, schedule, logistics)
Building the kitchen, dining area, and auxiliary spaces

festival.title: At the festival:
items: Organizing and preparing food for the team and participants
Operating the kitchen, maintaining order, supplying water and firewood
Coordinating shifts and assigning tasks within the kitchen
